Passionate About Digital.

I'm a Web Developer based in London

Building creative and effective websites is my passion. I have 2 years experience as a freelance web developer with skills in front-end development and digital marketing.

What I Do.

With good skills in design, development and digital marketing, I can provide a complete set of services to help you grow online. See below for the most popular services offered, or get in touch today, to see how I can help you with your project.

Wordpress & Drupal

Build self-publish websites powered by WordPress and Drupal.

HTML E-mails

Design and develop, effective client-wide compatible HTML e-mails.

UX Design & SEO

These 2 go hand-in-hand. To ensure you stay on top, fine-tuning your website with Google Analytics is always included.

Front-End Development

HTML, CSS, JavaScript and PHP. With these technologies I develop clean and responsive websites.

Some of My Work.

  • Chwz.it

    This is a rails based project I embarked on to gain a fullstack perspective on the development process. Users can post content and edit their profiles.

  • Infosecurity

    An example of a client-wide compatible HTML email. All e-mails are designed to look beautiful in all major clients.

  • Black Eagle Vision

    This is a responsive website built for a production company. Branding and logo design was also part of this project.

  • 58Labs

    A responsive photography website built on WordPress.

  • Enterprise Preston

    This responsive website was built for an NGO, to promote business in the UK. UX was important here as the organisation deals with various stakeholders.

  • Detodo

    DETODO was designed for a client wishing to self-manage his favourite video content on the internet.
